RawLine: SDM_1104007306,我看看…裡封寫著{color=#FF0000}「若中我谷之毒，可自此書內尋解毒之法。」{/color},我看看…里封写着{color=#FF0000}「若中我谷之毒，可自此书内寻解毒之法。」{/color}

Items.mt: Let's see... The inside cover reads "If you are poisoned by my valley, you can find the antidote in this book.
